info.title: Azure SQL Database API spec
info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your external server administrators.

put.description: Creates a new Server Active Directory Administrator or updates an existing server Active Directory Administrator.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating an Active Directory Administrator.

Create/Update a server administrator.request:
PUT https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-4799/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-6440/administrators/activeDirectory?api-version=2014-04-01 HTTP/1.1
Authorization: Bearer <token>
Content-Length: 371
Content-Type: application/json
accept-language: en-US
x-ms-client-request-id: 41addcc7-4e30-4a75-8788-ca3c1095dcda
host: management.azure.com
Connection: close

{"id":"/subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-4799/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-6440/administrators/activeDirectory","name":"activeDirectory","properties":{"administratorType":"ActiveDirectory","login":"bob@contoso.com","sid":"c6b82b90-a647-49cb-8a62-0d2d3cb7ac7c","tenantId":"c6b82b90-a647-49cb-8a62-0d2d3cb7ac7c"}}
Create/Update a server administrator.curl:
curl -X PUT 'https://management.azure.com/subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-4799/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-6440/administrators/activeDirectory?api-version=2014-04-01' \
-H 'authorization: bearer <token>' \
-H 'Content-Length: 371' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'accept-language: en-US' \
-H 'x-ms-client-request-id: 41addcc7-4e30-4a75-8788-ca3c1095dcda' \
-d @- << EOF
{
  "id": "/subscriptions/00000000-1111-2222-3333-444444444444/resourceGroups/sqlcrudtest-4799/providers/Microsoft.Sql/servers/sqlcrudtest-6440/administrators/activeDirectory",
  "name": "activeDirectory",
  "properties": {
    "administratorType": "ActiveDirectory",
    "login": "bob@contoso.com",
    "sid": "c6b82b90-a647-49cb-8a62-0d2d3cb7ac7c",
    "tenantId": "c6b82b90-a647-49cb-8a62-0d2d3cb7ac7c"
  }
}
EOF

tenantId.description: The server Active Directory Administrator tenant id.

ServerAdministratorProperties.description: The properties of an server Administrator.

value.description: The list of server Active Directory Administrators for the server.

ServerAdministratorListResult.description: The response to a list Active Directory Administrators request.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

DatabaseExpandParameter.name: $expand
DatabaseExpandParameter.description: A comma separated list of child objects to expand in the response. Possible properties: serviceTierAdvisors, transparentDataEncryption.

AdministratorNameParameter.name: administratorName
AdministratorNameParameter.description: Name of the server administrator resource.
